Hola,

I'm Ibrahim, junior web developer based in Tanzania.

About Me

I'm a junior web developer that likes working on the front end but also appreciates working on the back end.

I'm naturally curious and like trying to figure out how things function. I have a strong visual sense and like creating smart, entertaining, and effective online apps with a clean, distinct style.

An amazing fake project

Categories #design #website

This is my senior project.It's also my first project in which I created a website for agricultural and business information. All of the website's functionality is operational, including authentication, leaving a comment on a post, cart, and payment options. As the server-side language in my project, I'm using Python/Django. This project taught me a lot.
